title: [Gameplay] Snow Day Malzahar's recall visually bugged since 6.1
body:
• Description: With the Snow Day Malzahar skin, the recall animation appears to be visually bugged. The texture of the "Void Poro" that Malzahar spawns during the animation is just a solid blue color.
• Video / Screenshot: http://i.imgur.com/lis7PW3.png / http://i.imgur.com/UVghi5g.png
• Steps to reproduce: Enter a game as Snow Day Malzahar and channel a recall.
• Expected result: The Void Poro should be its usual textures.
• Observed result: The Void Poro's textures are just a flat, solid blue color.
• Reproduction rate: 10/10
• System specs: Processor: INTEL I5-3570K 3.4 GHZ RAM: 2x 4GB CORSAIR VENGEANCE 1600MHZ DDR3 Motherboard: GIGABYTE GA-Z77-D3H CROSSFIRE SATA 3 USB 3 LGA 1155 Sound Card: ASUS XONAR DG 5.1 CHANNELS PCI XONAR DG Graphics: NVIDIA GEFORCE GTX750 TI 2GB OC

replies.body:
Hey Ant -

Thanks for the well-written bug report. 

I noticed you gave your specs, which is awesome. ^-^ In this case, it's something affecting the game, as opposed to just your machine.

We're aware of the issue, and are looking to get this resolved. Lemme poke the bug again and get a pulse on what's going on. ^-^
Thanks for the reply. I really just copied my post about it from reddit, that's why it looks well-written. :P
